channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: One theory on why gold suffered its biggest one-day fall in more than ten years
item.description: Robin Brooks, senior fellow at the Brookings Institution, sought to explain the flows driving the price of gold

item.title: ‘Murdaugh: Death in the Family’ star Jason Clarke sells L.A. home at big discount for $3 million
item.description: Jason Clarke has finally offloaded his Los Angeles home after it spent more than a year on the market and underwent several markdowns.

item.title: Why David Einhorn’s Greenlight prefers this tiny biotech over AI ‘excitement’
item.description: Greenlight Capital’s third-quarter investor letter had almost nothing good to say about the hot AI trend, but it does have faith in a tiny biotech.

item.title: ‘I’m in the home stretch’: I’m 80. Do I leave my kids a ‘Magnificent Seven’ dynasty trust or a brokerage account?
item.description: “Do I leave them to pay capital-gains tax on the dynasty trust or estate tax on my personal account?”

item.title: Investor Lauren Taylor Wolfe says we are 'absolutely' in an AI bubble now
item.description: Lauren Taylor Wolfe, co-founder of Impactive Capital, said the surge in enthusiasm around artificial intelligence has all the markings of a bubble.
